scripts.dev: bun run deps && concurrently -k "bun run renderer" "bun run main"
scripts.deps: bun run shared && bun run core && bun run preload
scripts.main: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && bun run --cwd apps/main build && bun run --cwd apps/main start
scripts.build: bun run deps && bun run --cwd apps/renderer build && bun run --cwd apps/main build
